hero.title: Transform your photos into professional portraits with AI
hero.subtitle: Create smart prompts for Gemini and generate stunning photos in minutes

keywordSection.title: Curated Gemini photo-shoot prompts
keywordSection.intro: Pick a Gemini prompt kit that matches your shoot and get guidance in Portuguese or English.

feminino.title: Female portrait
feminino.description: Soft lighting and editorial styling tips focused on female portrait sessions.

masculino.title: Male portrait
masculino.description: Bold posing cues and dramatic light setups for masculine headshots.

casal.title: Couple sessions
casal.description: Story-driven couples prompts with outdoor and studio variations.

corporativo.title: Professional headshots
corporativo.description: Corporate framing, wardrobe and background recommendations for LinkedIn-ready shots.

keywordSection.bullet: Workflow: choose the style, add references, generate your portraits.

cta.freeNotice: Free plan includes 2 generations at 512x512 with watermark

features.title: Powerful features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to create professional photos
features.smartGeneratorDesc: Prompts automatically tuned for every photo style
features.professionalTemplatesDesc: Curated collection for LinkedIn, fashion, couples and more
features.unlimitedGenerationsDesc: Create as many photos as you want with consistent quality
features.fastResultsDesc: Optimized processing with photos ready in seconds
features.privateSecureDesc: Photos stored securely with access limited to your account
features.hdDownloadsDesc: Images ready for professional use without watermarks

benefits.testedPrompts: 104 curated prompts ready in Portuguese and English
benefits.allStyles: Portraits, couples, fashion, lifestyle and corporate
benefits.organizedCategories: Filters by category, style and occasion
benefits.highResolution: Up to 1024x1024 px on the Pro plan

features.compatibility: Works on desktop, tablet and mobile

trust.guaranteeDesc: Try risk-free and cancel if you're not satisfied

errors.invalidImageType: Unsupported image format. Use PNG or JPG.

errors.network: Connection error. Check your internet and try again.

examples.rainbowHands: Artistic composition with a rainbow prism

contact.title: Talk to our team
contact.subtitle: We're ready to help with technical questions, plans and integrations.

form.title: Send a message
form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: How can we help? Share details so we can assist faster.

hours.title: Support hours
hours.note: Messages received outside these hours are answered next business day

support.title: Need product assistance?
support.description: Attach links or screenshots in your email so we can review and reply faster.

infoCollect.title: Information we collect
infoCollect.content: We only collect the data necessary to deliver the service and improve your experience.
items: Account data: name, email and profile photo

howUse.title: How we use the information
howUse.content: Data is used to generate images, provide support and improve the product.
items: Send important communications about the service

photoProcessing.title: Photo processing
photoProcessing.content: Uploaded and generated images stay linked to your account so you can download them. You can delete them from the dashboard or email us for removal.

security.title: Security
security.content: We use Supabase and Cloudflare R2, which provide encryption at rest and in transit. Access is restricted to the small team maintaining the product.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.content: You can request export or permanent deletion of your data at any time.
items: Delete your account and associated data

thirdParty.title: Third-party services
thirdParty.content: We rely on providers like Supabase and Gemini under their respective terms and policies.

agreement.title: Acceptance of terms
agreement.content: By using Prompt Gemini Photos you agree to the conditions described in this document.

license.title: License of use
license.content: We grant a non-exclusive license to create images with Gemini using our prompts.
restrictions: Do not resell the prompts as your own
Do not use the service for illegal or offensive content
Do not attempt to bypass technical or usage limits

aiContent.title: AI-generated content
aiContent.content: Generated images may vary. Review them before using in public materials.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.content: Use of the service is also governed by our Privacy Policy.

liability.title: Limitation of liability
liability.content: We are not responsible for indirect losses resulting from misuse of the generated images.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: Reach out to kian@promptgeminifotos.com for legal questions

footer.description: Transform ordinary photos into professional portraits with AI-optimized prompts.
